GeoWombat configuration¶

GeoWombat has a context manager (geowombat.config) to assist in configurations¶

Import GeoWombat

In [1]: import geowombat as gw

Wrap functions in a context manager to control global arguments

In [2]: with gw.config.update(sensor='l8', scale_factor=0.0001):
   ...:     with gw.open(rgbn) as ds:
   ...:         for k, v in ds.gw.config.items():
   ...:             print(k, v)
   ...: 
sensor l8
scale_factor 0.0001
ref_image None
ref_bounds None
ref_crs None
ref_res None
blockxsize 512.0
blockysize 512.0
compress lzw
driver GTiff
tiled True

In [3]: with gw.config.update(sensor='planetscope', tiled=False):
   ...:     with gw.open(rgbn) as ds:
   ...:         for k, v in ds.gw.config.items():
   ...:             print(k, v)
   ...: 
sensor planetscope
scale_factor 1.0
ref_image None
ref_bounds None
ref_crs None
ref_res None
blockxsize 512.0
blockysize 512.0
compress lzw
driver GTiff
tiled False

In [4]: with gw.open(rgbn) as ds:
   ...:     for k, v in ds.gw.config.items():
   ...:         print(k, v)
   ...: 
sensor rgb
scale_factor 1.0
ref_image None
ref_bounds None
ref_crs None
ref_res None
blockxsize 512.0
blockysize 512.0
compress lzw
driver GTiff
tiled True
